RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set holds 1-min resolution electron distributions
(19 5-deg pitch angles vs. 19 energies) from the High Energy Electron
Fluxmeter (HEEF) on the CRRES spacecraft.  The energy range covered is 
0.3-7.5 MeV.  The data are in SGI(UNIX) binary format.  Read software
is contained within the companion documentation.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Donald Brautigam at AFRL.

now a readme at nssdcftp.
